title: Olympus Pro Treasury Diversification - Motion
body:
It is hereby motioned to transfer 1,000,000 MTA to the Asset Management subDAO in order to utilize these funds for treasury diversification purposes on the [Olympus Pro](https://pro.olympusdao.finance/) platform.

This is done to buy back LP tokens from the open market in exchange for discounted MTA in the coming weeks and months. 

The exact LP tokens to be bought back, timeframes, and MTA allocated per LP token are to be determined in the public forum post and Snapshot vote following this motion. 

**Should this motion be brought forward and shared as a public proposal on the mStable forum and Snapshot page?**
author: 0x908DB31Ce01DC42c8B712f9156E969bc65023119
